metadata.title: Wednesday, 10th February, 2016
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Chiefs and Traditional Affairs
parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to change the title ‘sub-chief’ in reference to a certain category of traditional leaders to a more befitting one; and
(b)    if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    when the rehabilitation of the Mambulwe Dam in Nangoma Parliamentary Constituency will commence;
(b)    who the contractor for the project is; and
(c)    what the time-frame for completion of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Defence when the following feeder roads in Malambo Parliamentary Constituency will be rehabilitated
parts: (a)    Malama-Chinzombo;
(b)    Nkhoko-Kasamanda Clinic in Msoro Area;
(c)    Chikowa-Nyamundela;
(d)    Katemo-Kabalika in Mnkhanga area;
(e)    Lugomo-Kamphasa in Jumbe area;
(f)    the road leading to Senior Chief Nsefu’s Palace; and
(g)    the road leading to Chief Mnkhanya’s Palace.
(a)    whether the Government has any plans to construct a district hospital in Sikongo;
(b)    if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c)    if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Commerce, Trade and Industry
parts: (a)    what type of products are exported to Angola;
(b)    whether the Government has any plans to encourage people living along the border with Angola to export agricultural products to that country;
(c)    if so, what the plans are; and
(d)    when the plans will be implemented.
(a)    how many Anti-Retroviral Therapy centres had been established in Chadiza Parliamentary Constituency as of 31st January, 2015; and
(b)    of the centres above, how many are operational.
(a)    what measures the Government has taken to enhance retention of teachers working in rural areas;
(b)    whether the Government has a policy on the number of years a teacher must work at one station before being transferred to another;
(c)    if so, what the duration is; and
(d)     whether the policy is enforced to the letter.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to improve the water reticulation system in Samfya District;
(b)    if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c)    if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Information and Broadcasting when the Government will present the Access to Information Bill to Parliament for enactment.

parts: (a)    whether the Isangano National Park in the Northern Province is operational;
(b)    if not, what measures the Government is taking to resuscitate the operations of the Park; and
(c)    what factors led to the decline in the operations of the Park.
